projects.title: Projects
projects.supportDescription: If you find this project helpful, you can support us in the following ways:

rideflow.title: RideFlow
rideflow.description: Whether you're commuting daily, enjoying a weekend ride, or training professionally, RideFlow is your perfect cycling companion.

edgebox.title: EdgeBox
edgebox.description: Edge computing toolbox offering AI LLM download, deployment, and execution capabilities.

features.0: Local AI model deployment and execution

echodiary.title: EchoDiary
echodiary.description: Intelligent voice diary application supporting voice recording, emotion analysis, and diary management.

items.0: Proficient in Java technology stack, skilled in Golang with good coding practices
items.1: Mastery of Golang technology stack including Gin, Gorm, Grpc-go, and Motan-go
items.2: Familiar with middleware source code such as Dubbo, RocketMQ, and Sharding-sphere
items.3: Experienced in cloud-native architecture, with extensive practical experience in implementing high-availability, high-performance, and elastic cloud-native systems based on Kubernetes (resource definition, service discovery, configuration center, observability, scaling, etc.)
items.4: Proficient in distributed system architecture design, with rich practical experience in database horizontal scaling, distributed transactions, and global deployment
items.5: Familiar with GitOps technology stack (Gitlab/ArgoCD, etc.), with practical experience in building CICD platforms from scratch
items.6: Rich practical experience in system observability, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), and FinOps (cloud resource analysis and cost optimization)

contact.title: Contact Me
